nodes.text: The Battle of Tansarii Point Station was a battle involving M3-A Scyk interceptors at Tansarii Point Station which saw the defeat of Talonbane Cobra, one of Black Sun's ace pilots. With Cobra's defeat, the Car'das smugglers present managed to gain the upper hand and turn the tide of the battle. In its aftermath, the battle's survivors were respected throughout the sector Tansarii Point Station inhabited.
